column1: What are the different type of blockchain
column3: T046-Blockchains are of three types: 1) Public  2) Private 3)Consortium
T046-A blockchain is so called public when  anyone can become a member of the network without condition of admissions. The public blockchain is permissionless and open to everybody without exception.
T046-Private or permissioned blockchains operate similarly to public blockchains but have access controls that limit who can participate in the network.

T046-In Blockchain, we have no centralized system of control but traditional database  is centrally controlled by the administrator.Blockchain  makes the information safe and secure but  traditional database  led to the cases of hacking and forgery.

T046- In decentralized databse we have no centralized system of control but  centralized database is centrally controlled by the administrator.With the decentralized system  it eliminates the risk of accessing the data and corrupting it but  in the centralized database, anyone who has access to the system can corrupt or destroy the data
T046-A distributed database is basically a database that is not limited to one system, it is spread over different sites, i.e, on multiple computers or over a network of computers.
